tool_description: Determine the gender associated with a given name or name and country. With this API, you can easily integrate gender detection capabilities into your applications, platforms, or services, enabling you to identify the likely gender associated with a person's name based on statistical analysis and data patterns.
name: Gender Detector API
title: Gender Detector API

api_list.name: Detect Gender From Name and Country
api_list.description: Detect Gender From Name and Country

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: This needs to be a two letter country code. e.g. us, it, zw, etc

api_list.name: Detect Gender From Name
